title: Jordan Peterson Convention? Being a Christian without knowing?
description:
Job asks (through Jeff) when are we going to have Lobstercon? (There already is one apparently but not involving JBP). Can you be a Christian and not know Christ? Lots more CS Lewis. 
My first talk with Jeff https://youtu.be/JoAHv6_LG_w
Jeff in the 4 Way Conversation https://youtu.be/mHBVLEthbgk

Lobstercom

Job’s challenge

God and evil

When can someone call themself a christian

Secretly influenced Christian

Can someone be a Christian without knowing it
Can Christ flow through non-Christian
Can Christ fully know someone without someone knowing Christ

CS Lewis God in the Dock. questions for factory workers. 
Answers to questions on Christianity
How you would define a practicing Christian
In that sense there are no practicing Christians. 
Everything as something that comes from him. How would he wish me to deal with this. 

Is intentionally cooperating with God without being able to accept him consciously good enough? Good enough for what? What is good enough for God? What is acceptable to God? 

Blog post. Mere Christianity. The world does not consist of 100% Xians and non-Xians. 

The Last Battle: Emith in Aslan’s heaven

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/

https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

Also on Lbry: https://beta.lbry.tv/@paulvanderklay

Join the Sacramento JBP Meetup https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/

You can donate to Living Stones CRC to support this work here http://www.livingstonescrc.org/donate
